title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added changelog entries for Claude Sonnet 4.5 release (public preview) and Copilot coding agent updates for GitHub Mobile.
Made Visual Studio subscription billing documentation available for GitHub Enterprise Server (GHES) by adding `ghes: '*'` version flags.
Updated GHES documentation links to point to enterprise-cloud@latest with conditional rendering notes.

- Updated GHES documentation links to point to enterprise-cloud@latest with conditional rendering notes.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
